text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: evaM saMbhASamANe tu dhaumye kauravanandana
text.ur: evaṁ saṁbhāṣamāṇe tu dhaumye kauravanandana

text.ascii: lomazaH sumahAtejA RSis tatrAjagAma ha
text.ur: lomaśaḥ sumahātejā r̥ṣis tatrājagāma ha

text.ascii: taM pANDavAgrajo rAjA sagaNo brAhmaNAz ca te
text.ud: तं पाण्डवाग्रजो राजा सगणो ब्राह्मणाश्च ते
text.ur: taṁ pāṇḍavāgrajo rājā sagaṇo brāhmaṇāś ca te

text.ascii: udatiSThan mahAbhAgaM divi zakram ivAmarAH
text.ur: udatiṣṭhan mahābhāgaṁ divi śakram ivāmarāḥ

text.ascii: tam abhyarcya yathAnyAyaM dharmarAjo yudhiSThiraH
text.ur: tam abhyarcya yathānyāyaṁ dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

text.ascii: papracchAgamane hetum aTane ca prayojanam
text.ur: papracchāgamane hetum aṭane ca prayojanam

text.ascii: sa pRSTaH pANDuputreNa prIyamANo mahAmanAH
text.ur: sa pr̥ṣṭaḥ pāṇḍuputreṇa prīyamāṇo mahāmanāḥ

text.ascii: uvAca zlakSNayA vAcA harSayann iva pANDavAn
text.ur: uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā harṣayann iva pāṇḍavān

text.ascii: saMcarann asmi kaunteya sarvalokAn yadRcchayA
text.ur: saṁcarann asmi kaunteya sarvalokān yadr̥cchayā

text.ascii: gataH zakrasya sadanaM tatrApazyaM surezvaram
text.ur: gataḥ śakrasya sadanaṁ tatrāpaśyaṁ sureśvaram

text.ascii: tava ca bhrAtaraM vIram apazyaM savyasAcinam
text.ur: tava ca bhrātaraṁ vīram apaśyaṁ savyasācinam

text.ascii: zakrasyArdhAsanagataM tatra me vismayo mahAn
text.ur: śakrasyārdhāsanagataṁ tatra me vismayo mahān

text.ascii: AsIt puruSazArdUla dRSTvA pArthaM tathAgatam
text.ur: āsīt puruṣaśārdūla dr̥ṣṭvā pārthaṁ tathāgatam

text.ascii: Aha mAM tatra devezo gaccha pANDusutAn iti
text.ud: आह मां तत्र देवेशो गच्छ पाण्डुसुतानिति
text.ur: āha māṁ tatra deveśo gaccha pāṇḍusutān iti

text.ascii: so 'ham abhyAgataH kSipraM didRkSus tvAM sahAnujam
text.ur: so ’ham abhyāgataḥ kṣipraṁ didr̥kṣus tvāṁ sahānujam

text.ascii: vacanAt puruhUtasya pArthasya ca mahAtmanaH
text.ur: vacanāt puruhūtasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ

text.ascii: AkhyAsye te priyaM tAta mahat pANDavanandana
text.ur: ākhyāsye te priyaṁ tāta mahat pāṇḍavanandana

text.ascii: bhrAtRbhiH sahito rAjan kRSNayA caiva tac chRNu
text.ur: bhrātr̥bhiḥ sahito rājan kr̥ṣṇayā caiva tac chr̥ṇu

text.ascii: yat tvayokto mahAbAhur astrArthaM pANDavarSabha
text.ur: yat tvayokto mahābāhur astrārthaṁ pāṇḍavarṣabha

text.ascii: tad astram AptaM pArthena rudrAd apratimaM mahat
text.ur: tad astram āptaṁ pārthena rudrād apratimaṁ mahat

text.ascii: yat tad brahmaziro nAma tapasA rudram Agatam
text.ur: yat tad brahmaśiro nāma tapasā rudram āgatam

text.ascii: amRtAd utthitaM raudraM tal labdhaM savyasAcinA
text.ur: amr̥tād utthitaṁ raudraṁ tal labdhaṁ savyasācinā

text.ascii: tat samantraM sasaMhAraM saprAyazcittamaGgalam
text.ur: tat samantraṁ sasaṁhāraṁ saprāyaścittamaṅgalam

text.ascii: vajraM cAnyAni cAstrANi daNDAdIni yudhiSThira
text.ur: vajraṁ cānyāni cāstrāṇi daṇḍādīni yudhiṣṭhira

text.ascii: yamAt kuberAd varuNAd indrAc ca kurunandana
text.ur: yamāt kuberād varuṇād indrāc ca kurunandana

text.ascii: astrANy adhItavAn pArtho divyAny amitavikramaH
text.ur: astrāṇy adhītavān pārtho divyāny amitavikramaḥ

text.ascii: vizvAvasoz ca tanayAd gItaM nRttaM ca sAma ca
text.ud: विश्वावसोश्च तनयाद्गीतं नृत्तं च साम च
text.ur: viśvāvasoś ca tanayād gītaṁ nr̥ttaṁ ca sāma ca

text.ascii: vAditraM ca yathAnyAyaM pratyavindad yathAvidhi
text.ur: vāditraṁ ca yathānyāyaṁ pratyavindad yathāvidhi

text.ascii: evaM kRtAstraH kaunteyo gAndharvaM vedam AptavAn
text.ur: evaṁ kr̥tāstraḥ kaunteyo gāndharvaṁ vedam āptavān

text.ascii: sukhaM vasati bIbhatsur anujasyAnujas tava
text.ur: sukhaṁ vasati bībhatsur anujasyānujas tava

text.ascii: yadarthaM mAM surazreSTha idaM vacanam abravIt
text.ur: yadarthaṁ māṁ suraśreṣṭha idaṁ vacanam abravīt

text.ascii: tac ca te kathayiSyAmi yudhiSThira nibodha me
text.ud: तच्च ते कथयिष्यामि युधिष्ठिर निबोध मे
text.ur: tac ca te kathayiṣyāmi yudhiṣṭhira nibodha me

text.ascii: bhavAn manuSyalokAya gamiSyati na saMzayaH
text.ur: bhavān manuṣyalokāya gamiṣyati na saṁśayaḥ

text.ascii: brUyAd yudhiSThiraM tatra vacanAn me dvijottama
text.ur: brūyād yudhiṣṭhiraṁ tatra vacanān me dvijottama

text.ascii: AgamiSyati te bhrAtA kRtAstraH kSipram arjunaH
text.ur: āgamiṣyati te bhrātā kr̥tāstraḥ kṣipram arjunaḥ

text.ascii: surakAryaM mahat kRtvA yad AzakyaM divaukasaiH
text.ur: surakāryaṁ mahat kr̥tvā yad āśakyaṁ divaukasaiḥ

text.ascii: tapasA tu tvam AtmAnaM bhrAtRbhiH saha yojaya
text.ud: तपसा तु त्वमात्मानं भ्रातृभिः सह योजय
text.ur: tapasā tu tvam ātmānaṁ bhrātr̥bhiḥ saha yojaya

text.ascii: tapaso hi paraM nAsti tapasA vindate mahat
text.ud: तपसो हि परं नास्ति तपसा विन्दते महत्
text.ur: tapaso hi paraṁ nāsti tapasā vindate mahat

text.ascii: ahaM ca karNaM jAnAmi yathAvad bharatarSabha
text.ur: ahaṁ ca karṇaṁ jānāmi yathāvad bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: na sa pArthasya saMgrAme kalAm arhati SoDazIm
text.ud: न स पार्थस्य संग्रामे कलामर्हति षोडशीम्
text.ur: na sa pārthasya saṁgrāme kalām arhati ṣoḍaśīm

text.ascii: yac cApi te bhayaM tasmAn manasistham ariMdama
text.ur: yac cāpi te bhayaṁ tasmān manasistham ariṁdama

text.ascii: tac cApy apahariSyAmi savyasAcAv ihAgate
text.ur: tac cāpy apahariṣyāmi savyasācāv ihāgate

text.ascii: yac ca te mAnasaM vIra tIrthayAtrAm imAM prati
text.ud: यच्च ते मानसं वीर तीर्थयात्रामिमां प्रति
text.ur: yac ca te mānasaṁ vīra tīrthayātrām imāṁ prati

text.ascii: tac ca te lomazaH sarvaM kathayiSyaty asaMzayam
text.ur: tac ca te lomaśaḥ sarvaṁ kathayiṣyaty asaṁśayam

text.ascii: yac ca kiM cit tapoyuktaM phalaM tIrtheSu bhArata
text.ur: yac ca kiṁ cit tapoyuktaṁ phalaṁ tīrtheṣu bhārata

text.ascii: maharSir eSa yad brUyAt tac chraddheyam ananyathA
text.ur: maharṣir eṣa yad brūyāt tac chraddheyam ananyathā
